home.name: Alberto Cabello Lasheras
home.description: I am a Fullstack developer experienced in designing and building web and mobile applications using TypeScript (Angular) and Java (SpringBoot). I master relational (MySQL) and non-relational (MongoDB) databases, ensuring solid code and deployments. I bring creativity through 3D modeling and interactive environments. I work proactively in teams, have coordinated groups under pressure, and stand out for my communication, responsibility, and fast adoption of new technologies.
